abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32513096, pmid32516161, pmid32513867, pmid32518471, pmid32517833, pmid32520309, pmid32519136, pmid32518177, pmid32519894, pmid32511791, pmid32518212, pmid32519760, pmid32518419, pmid32522736, pmid32513065, pmid32519636, pmid32518989, pmid32518072, pmid32518103, pmid32519164, pmid32516281
name: Covid-19 LST Report 2020.06.13
